name: Arena Trap
summary: Prevents all foes from fleeing or switching out if the user is in the battle field. Pokémon immune to Ground types (Flying-types, Pokémon with Levitate, and those under Magnet Rise and Telekinesis), as well as Ghost types, can switch out.
viability: Arena Trap is essentially a less-severe version of Shadow Tag. The ability to trap your opponent is very valuable, since you can do a number of things. Dugtrio can get that revenge kill, or can set up Stealth Rock without having to worry about a possible Magic Bounce switch.
